plays.text: Goal scored by Shjon Podein assisted by Eric Messier and Stephane Yelle
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Holding Adam Foote
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Roughing Brad Larsen
Penalty to Brad Larsen 2 minutes for Roughing Dick Tarnstrom
Penalty to Pascal Trepanier 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Holding Mariusz Czerkawski
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Vaclav Nedorost
Penalty to Dave Scatchard 2 minutes for Interference Chris Drury
Penalty to Adrian Aucoin 2 minutes for High Sticking Brian Willsie
Penalty to Jason Blake 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Patrick Roy
